content.body: sideshowbarker: It looks like the MDN-spec-links project moved to html-now? But the SPECMAP.json file is still present at the old location, and apparently out of date.
content.formatted_body: sideshowbarker: It looks like the MDN-spec-links project moved to html-now? But the SPECMAP.json file is still present at the old location, and apparently out of date.

content.body: (Bikeshed is pulling down some 404 pages for mdn data right now.)

> <@tabatkins:matrix.org> sideshowbarker: It looks like the MDN-spec-links project moved to html-now? But the SPECMAP.json file is still present at the old location, and apparently out of date.

Not moved. The html-now SPECMAP.json is a copy. But spec-links is just borked at the moment, for some reason. I’ll look into right now and fix it.

content.body: Kk. I should respond to 404s better too
